Introduction

Elation Engineering Pvt Ltd was established in 2021 by IIT alumni with a dream to provide innovative processing solutions in economical way to global food processing industries. Our 24 x 7 completely dedicated customer focus, strong work ethics , constant knowledge upgradation along wide experience in this field helping us to take strong steps towards making our dream a reality.

Equipment Maintenance and Retrofits: Regular maintenance prevents unexpected breakdowns, ensuring equipment operates reliably and meets production or operational targets. Proper maintenance and timely retrofits extend the lifespan of machinery, reducing the need for frequent replacements and minimizing capital expenditure. Additionally, retrofitting enables older equipment to incorporate modern technologies, enhancing functionality, automation, and compatibility with current processes.

Equipment Manufacturing
Pressure Vessels

With our extensive design and fabrication expertise, we offer durable and robust Pressure Vessels. Our range of Pressure Vessels is crafted from premium-grade raw materials and manufactured in compliance with global quality standards to ensure maximum performance, reliability, and efficiency. We are committed to delivering precision-engineered, safe, and high-quality pressure vessels designed for long-term industrial use.
Heat Exchangers

We believe that customization is key to delivering the best solutions. Backed by extensive experience in the thermal design and manufacturing of heat exchangers, we offer a wide range of products including Shell and Tube Heat Exchangers, Corrugated Tube Heat Exchangers, and Spiral Heat Exchangers. Each unit is designed to meet specific process requirements and provides highly energy-efficient and reliable heat transfer solutions.
Agitated Tanks

Agitator Tanks are used for dispersing, suspending, emulsifying, and homogenizing liquids and pastes. We design and manufacture a wide range of agitators suitable for various processes in the pharmaceutical, chemical, food, cosmetics, and related industries.
Our agitators are equipped with different types of agitation components to perform processes such as mixing, blending, dissolution, dispersion, homogenization, reaction, fermentation, oxidation, digestion, and emulsification of liquids, pastes, ointments, solutions, viscous materials and solid-liquid mixtures.
Storage Silos

We design and supply storage silos and tanks that play a pivotal role in maintaining product quality. Each unit is engineered with precision to meet the stringent requirements of hygiene, temperature control, and efficient drainage.Constructed from high-quality materials, our tanks ensure superior hygiene, excellent corrosion resistance, and are easy to clean and maintain. Depending on process requirements, various accessories such as temperature and level control systems, agitation mechanisms, and hot or cold insulation can be integrated.We offer storage tanks and silos with capacities ranging from 1,000 L to 150,000 L, designed to deliver reliable performance and long service life across diverse industrial applications.
Reactors

With the support of our expert team, we design and manufacture a wide range of reactors that are highly scalable—suitable for both small-scale laboratory applications and large-scale industrial processes. This flexibility makes them ideal for diverse industries and production requirements.Our reactors are engineered and fabricated using high-quality components, modern machinery, and precision-built coil vessels, ensuring durability and optimal performance. Each reactor is constructed from stainless steel and comprises essential parts such as coils, vessels, valves, and other critical fittings. The integrated coil system allows for the circulation of heating or cooling media, enabling precise temperature control of the reactants throughout the process.

Audits, Certifications

Audits in the food industry are systematic and independent evaluations of a company’s processes, systems, and procedures to assess compliance with regulatory requirements, industry standards, and customer expectations. These audits help identify potential risks and hazards that could compromise food safety and product quality.
They play a vital role in ensuring adherence to government regulations and demonstrating a company’s commitment to maintaining high standards of food safety and quality. This commitment is essential for building customer trust and sustaining a strong reputation in the market. Moreover, audits provide valuable opportunities for continuous improvement—helping companies pinpoint weaknesses, implement corrective actions, enhance operational efficiency, reduce costs, and ultimately improve customer satisfaction.

ISO 9001 : 2015 – Quality Management System 
ISO 22000 : 2018 – Food Safety Management System 
ISO 28000 : 2007 – Risk in Supply Chain Management 
EMS 140001 – Environmental Management System 
OHSAS 18001- Occupational Health and Safety Assessment 
HACCP – Hazard Analysis Critical Control Point
GMP &  GHP – Good Manufacturing and Hygienic Practices
Training and Consulting

Training in food processing is extremely important for several reasons — both for individuals working in the industry and for the overall safety and quality of food products.
Training helps employees understand quality control measures and processing standards.
Training helps in proper equipment maintenance, leading to longer machine life and fewer breakdowns
Training ensures that employees understand and follow these legal and safety requirements.
With proper training, team can adapt to new technologies, automation, and processing methods.
Proper handling and processing techniques minimize raw material loss.
Well-trained team help improve yield and reduce energy and water consumption.

Advance Technologies
Continuous Sugar Dissolving System

Continuous sugar dissolving systems are advanced technologies designed to efficiently dissolve sugar in water, ensuring consistent syrup quality and optimal production processes in the food and beverage industry.
Our Continuous sugar dissolving systems are useful in various industries, particularly in beverage and food production. These systems allow for the continuous mixing of sugar with water, producing a homogeneous sugar solution (syrup) that can be used in various applications, such as soft drinks, sauces, and other food products.
We can also design and supply dry sugar handling system, activiated carbon system, filtration system, syrup pasteurisation system. 
This system provides precise control over the sugar concentration, reducing waste and ensuring consistent quality in production.
Microwave Heating and High Frequency Applications

Microwave heating utilizes electromagnetic waves in the microwave frequency range to generate heat within materials by inducing molecular motion. This efficient and rapid heating method finds applications across various fields, including food processing, pharmaceuticals etc. In the food industry, microwave heating is employed for cooking, thawing, and drying processes, offering advantages such as reduced processing time and improved product quality. Similarly, in pharmaceutical manufacturing, microwave heating enables precise temperature control during synthesis and purification processes, leading to enhanced product yields and purity.
High-frequency heating involves the application of electromagnetic waves with frequencies higher than those used in conventional microwave heating.
https://aimhha.org/

Water Treatment System

We are having experience handling water from sea, borewell, river, and surface sources through various stages of treatment such as pre-treatment, ultrafiltration, reverse osmosis, nanofiltration, etc. Based on the water analysis we can develop a concept that meets the specific application requirements. Reverse osmosis plant, Multi Media filter, High Rate Solid Contact Clarifier, Turbidity Treatment, Mineral Dosing, Iron Removal, Silica Removal, Seawater Desalination, Brackish Water Reverse Osmosis, Mixed Bed Deionizer, Electrodeionization,Ozonation & UV etc
https://alantech.in/raw-water-treatment
Ultra High Pressure Homogenisation

Our product range of homogenisers is 200 Bar g to 1500 Bar g with flow rate from 40 Lph to 6000 Lph. With extensive research and development, our homogenisers provide uniform particle size reduction and effective cell disruption. Our effective design provide high efficiency resulting desired quality with energy saving.  Homogenization technology uses efficient high pressure energy to break particles present in fluids to the smallest possible size, down to nanometer range. This process creates a stable emulsion or dispersion by forcing the product through a specifically engineered homogenizing valve under high density fluid-dynamic energy conditions thus improving product shelf life and performance.
GSS
Powder Transfer System

Our Powder Transfer Systems (PTS) are specialized equipment used to move powder materials from one location to another in a safe, efficient, and contained manner. These systems are essential in industries where handling powders can pose safety risks or where contamination control is critical. PTS is widely used in pharmaceutical, chemical, food, and polymer processing industries to ensure the integrity and safety of both the product and the operators. The vacuum powder transfer system operates by using a vacuum to create a low-pressure area that enables the movement of powder from a source to a destination.
Our PTS systems ensure that powders are transferred in a safe environment. They speed up production processes, minimize the risk of contamination, handle dense phase conveying with low velocity and reduce the risk of electrostatic charges during transfer.
Industrial Refrigeration

We provide innovative industrial refrigeration process solutions  and execute them with quality workmanship. We provide various refrigeration applications like Precooling, High Rh cold storage, Deep Freezer, Blast Freezer, IQF, Dehumidification, Ripening chamber etc. We can design the refrigeration systems with R22,R404a,R717 etc.
Different applications of our refrigeration systems are for Frozen food ( - 40 Deg C ), Brine Chiller Package ( -10 to -40 Deg C ), Process Chillers (-5 to -40 Deg C) Utility Chillers (+5 to -10 Deg C).
We provide customised refrigeration system including Compressor, highly efficient heat exchanger, pressure vessels, PLC system with field instrumentation and process piping
